Articles.Content: Quick! Feed the forum server hamsters! They can't take this hype!

> 
> First bad gateway! nginx 1.8.0

Can confirm. Got the same thing.
I am starting to get bad gateways. We are DDOSing the forums with hype packets.
The bad gateway is the gateway to 1.0, FASTER.
Forum crash.... HYPE HYPE HYPE!!!!
I can barely load the forum now...bad gateways everywhere....must be a precursor...
The forums are slowing down suddenly!
Hype crash!!!
I'm getting 502 errors here!
![?u=http%3A%2F%2Femotibot.net%2Fpix%2F1033.gif&f=1](https://images.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=http%3A%2F%2Femotibot.net%2Fpix%2F1033.gif&f=1)
Lots of bad gateways.
Realise your inner HYPE.
They've GOT to release it now, I mean, we're DDOSing the forums now, that's ludicrous
OOOOOOOh I've joined the masterrace and got a picture at the KSP site! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
She can't take much more cap'n!
Yeah first 502 here too. MOAR boosters, MOAR hype!
502 gateway errors! error hype!
[it's broken](https://www.dropbox.com/s/14fp3nvxkyn416c/Screenshot%202015-04-27%2010.23.40.png?dl=0)
Suppose to be getting a current event in school, I find it better to hype to the extreme

Bill and Bob are preparing special effect for the trailer video!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bTUu4ZLtDSs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
It's coming off the rails!!

> 
> They've GOT to release it now, I mean, we're DDOSing the forums now, that's ludicrous

Happened for 0.23.5 as well, even more so.

> 
> I'm getting 502 errors here!

We're worse than anonymous DDOSing the servers! The hype train is riping apart the interwebz continuum!
We are bending the rails, engage stabalising fins! Prepare for reduction in acceleration. But never slow down...
bad gateways...
